song.title: If You Really Want to xxxx Insert Your xxxx
song.info:
Released at the Breakpoint 2008 (streamed music compo)
Lyrics:
If you really want to DEMO (x4) Insert your DISK
Amiga (insert your disk) Atari (insert your disk) C-64 (insert your disk) ZX Spectrum and Amstrad (insert your disk) Atari (insert your disk) C-64 (insert your disk) PC (well, I don't think they have disk drives any more)
